metadata.title: CVE-2017-17863 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - high
metadata.description: kernel/bpf/verifier.c in the Linux kernel 4.9.x through 4.9.71 does notcheck the relationship between pointer values and the BPF stack, whichallows local users to cause a denial of service (integer overflow orinvalid memory access) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
